description: Draws geometric shapes with rotation for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for draw_geometric_shapes_with_rotation
result = draw_geometric_shapes_with_rotation(data)

educational_standards.description: Compare quadrilaterals to determine how shared attributes group them into larger or overlapping categories (e.g., explaining why every square is both a rectangle and a rhombus).
Select all names for a quadrilateral.
